articles.title: Atomic Energy Council budget cut amid sexual harassment allegations
articles.author: > Chinese Version
articles.excerpt: Taipei, Dec. 14 (CNA) A legislative committee hearing on Wednesday reached an agreement to withhold NT$10 million (US$327,463) of th Council's (AEC) 2023 budget in the wake of sexual…
articles.summary: Atomic Energy Council Minister Hsieh Hsiao-hsing speaks to reporters at the Legislative Yuan in Taipei on Nov. 30. CNA file photo Taipei, Dec. 14 (CNA) A legislative committee hearing on Wednesday reached an agreement to withhold NT$10 million (US$327,463) of the Atomic Energy Council's (AEC) 2023 budget in the wake of sexual harassment allegations against AEC Minister Hsieh Hsiao-hsing (謝曉星).In addition to the budget freeze, lawmakers adopted a proposal by Kuomintang (KMT) Legislator Wan Mei-ling (萬美玲) to deny Hsieh a NT$477,000 stipend.

articles.title: U.S. barred Taiwan from buying parts for local missiles: Ex-military research chief
articles.author: Focus Taiwan
articles.excerpt: Taipei, Dec. 13 (CNA) The former head of the Taiwan military's top research unit has disclosed in a recently published memoir that the United States had prevented Taiwan from obtaining some key…
articles.summary: Hsiung Feng II and Hsiung Feng III missile launch trucks are pictured in the National Day military parade in 2021. CNA file photo Taipei, Dec. 13 (CNA) The former head of the Taiwan military's top research unit has disclosed in a recently published memoir that the United States had prevented Taiwan from obtaining some key components for domestic long-range missiles so that Taiwan would be forced to buy U.S.-made ones only.Retired Rear Admiral Kung Chia-cheng (龔家政), the former president of the state-run weapons developer National Chung-Shan Institute of Science & Technology (NCSIST), made the accusation during a memoir published by Academia Sinica, the top research institution in Taiwan, last month.

articles.title: YouTube ahora muestra estimaciones del tiempo que tarda un vídeo en procesarse
articles.author: Europa Press
articles.excerpt: YouTube ahora muestra estimaciones del tiempo que tarda un vídeo en procesarse
articles.summary: YouTube ha integrado en Studio estimaciones del tiempo que tardarán los vídeos en procesarse en sus diferentes niveles de calidad (SD, HD y 4K) después de haberlos subido a la plataforma, una característica con la que espera ofrecer más información a los usuarios.El tiempo que tarda un vídeo en imporarse a la plataforma depende principalmente del tipo de archivo, su formato y su peso, entre otros factores. Los vídeos de mayor calidad tardan más en subirse, de modo que uno en 1080p se cargará más rápido que otro en 4K.

articles.title: El grupo rebelde M23 confirma una reunión con el Ejército congoleño para abordar el conflicto en el este de RDC
articles.author: Europa Press
articles.excerpt: El grupo rebelde M23 confirma una reunión con el Ejército congoleño para abordar el conflicto en el este de RDC
articles.summary: El grupo rebelde Movimiento 23 de Marzo (M23) ha asegurado haber mantenido una reunión con representantes del Ejército de República Democrática del Congo (RDC) para abordar una "resolución pacífica" al conflicto en el este del país, que ha provocado además un repunte de las tensiones entre Kinshasa y Ruanda.El portavoz del M23, Lawrence Kanyuka, ha indicado en un comunicado que el encuentro tuvo lugar el lunes en Kibumba y ha agregado que en el mismo participaron delegados del Ejército, la Misión de Naciones Unidas en RDC (MONUSCO) y otros organismos regionales.

articles.title: Biden keeps calling for an 'assault weapons ban,' but is anyone listening?
articles.author: Haisten Willis
articles.excerpt: As the lame-duck session of Congress nears a close, President Joe Biden continues to repeat calls to ban assault-style weapons before Republicans take over the House of Representatives.
articles.summary:
As the lame-duck session of Congress nears a close, President Joe Biden continues to repeat calls to ban assault-style weapons before Republicans take over the House of Representatives.
But whether he has the votes to get it done, and whether his work behind the scenes matches his public rhetoric, remains to be seen. Biden made his latest plea on the 10-year anniversary of the Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting.
BIDEN CALLS FOR 'ASSAULT WEAPONS BAN' ON SANDY HOOK SHOOTING ANNIVERSARY
Load Error
"Ten years ago today at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Connecticut, our nation watched as the unthinkable happened," Biden said in a prepared statement.

articles.title: Twitter-Deal und Tesla-Crash                     Elon Musks Abstieg: Tesla-Boss nicht mehr reichster Mensch der Welt!
articles.excerpt: Boardregeln Registrierung FAQ Top & Flop Listen DAX MDAX SDAX TecDAX
articles.summary:
Laut Bloomberg Billionaires Index ist das Vermögen von Elon Musk seit Januar um mehr als 100 Milliarden auf 163,6 Milliarden US-Dollar zurückgegangen. Das ist weniger als das Nettovermögen
 von Bernard Arnault, der 170,8 Milliarden US-Dollar schwer sein soll. Arnaults Reichtum stammt zum größten Teil aus seinem 48-prozentigen Anteil am Luxusgütergiganten LVMH.


 Das Vermögen von Elon Musk lag in der Vergangenheit zeitweise bei mehr als 340 Milliarden US-Dollar. Doch dieses Jahr lief es nicht gut für den Ausnahmeunternehmer: Die Tesla-Aktie verlor seit
 Jahresbeginn rund 50 Prozent.

articles.title: Gericht                    Keine Gebühr für Berechnung der Vorfälligkeitsentschädigung
articles.author: Nachrichtenagentur: dpa-AFX
articles.excerpt: FRANKFURT (dpa-AFX) - Banken dürfen keine Gebühren für die Berechnung einer Vorfälligkeitsentschädigung im Fall einer vorzeitigen Darlehensrückzahlung verlangen. Das geht aus einer am Mittwoch…
articles.summary:
FRANKFURT (dpa-AFX) - Banken dürfen keine Gebühren für die Berechnung einer Vorfälligkeitsentschädigung im Fall einer vorzeitigen Darlehensrückzahlung verlangen. Das geht aus einer am Mittwoch
 veröffentlichten Entscheidung des Oberlandesgerichts Frankfurt (OLG) hervor. Das Urteil ist noch nicht rechtskräftig. Das OLG ließ Berufung zu.


 Das Gericht gab einem Kreditnehmer in zweiter Instanz Recht. Der Bankkunde klagte gegen ein Kreditinstitut, das eine Pauschale von 100 Euro für die Berechnung der Vorfälligkeitsentschädigung
 verlangte.

articles.summary:
Mutares Aktie mit dem Drang zu mehr. Mehr Übernahmen, mehr – wesentlich mehr – Umsatz und auch auf der Verkaufsseite einige 'sehr reife Beteiligungen'. So konnte man
 von einem für die Mutares SE & Co. KGaA (ISIN: DE000A2NB650) brennenden CIO, Johannes Laumann, auf dem EKF2022 erfahren. 


 Stolz auf das Erreichte, stolz auf 'sein' M&A-Team und voller Optimismus als Mutares weiter, das abliefern zu können, was man zugesagt hat. Und die Bilanz des Carve-Out Spezialisten sieht
 dieses Jahr wirklich beeindruckend aus.

 KÖLN (dpa-AFX) - Nach herben Einbußen zu Beginn der Corona-Pandemie hat sich Deutschlands Modehandel in diesem Jahr etwas erholt, das Vor-Corona-Niveau aber noch nicht erreicht. Mit dem Verkauf von
 Bekleidung, Schuhen und Lederwaren komme die Branche in diesem Jahr voraussichtlich auf 74,6 Milliarden Euro und damit fünf Prozent mehr als 2021, teilte der Handelsverband BTE am Mittwoch in Köln
 mit.


 Verglichen mit 2019 sei dies noch ein Minus von zwei Prozent.

articles.summary:
NEURUPPIN/BERLIN/MÜNCHEN (dpa-AFX) - Nach Razzien gegen Klimaaktivisten der "Letzten Generation" prüfen Ermittler den Verdacht der Bildung einer kriminellen Vereinigung. Es seien umfangreich
 Unterlagen und Datenträger beschlagnahmt worden, teilte die zuständige Staatsanwaltschaft im brandenburgischen Neuruppin am Mittwoch mit. Die Aktivisten ließen sich von den Ermittlungen und
 drohenden Strafen indes nicht stoppen: In Berlin und München gab es neue Proteste.


 So blockierten etwa 20 Menschen in Berlin nach Polizeiangaben wieder Straßen an drei Orten und verursachten Staus.

articles.title: Is Your iPhone Automatically Dimming? There's a Fix for That
articles.author: Accessibility
articles.excerpt: Prevent your iPhone from going dark on its own.
articles.summary:
Your iPhone can sometimes feel like it has a mind of its own. Maybe an application suddenly force-closes or your phone automatically restarts -- but these things usually happen for a reason, much to our displeasure. That doesn't mean that it isn't annoying though, and if you're dealing with your display's brightness continuously adjusting on its own, you might feel at your wit's end.
Load Error
There are several reasons why your display intensity might be adjusting on its own, and it's not always as easy as toggling off an auto-brightness setting -- although that's a good start.

articles.title: Samenvatting: net group versnelt data-first klantbenadering met Hansen
articles.excerpt: Hansen Technologies (ASX:HSN), een toonaangevende wereldwijde leverancier van software en diensten aan de energie-, water- en communicatie-industrie,
articles.summary: December 14, 2022 08:13 AM Eastern Standard Time MELBOURNE, Australië--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Hansen Technologies (ASX:HSN), een toonaangevende wereldwijde leverancier van software en diensten aan de energie-, water- en communicatie-industrie, is verheugd een nieuwe overeenkomst aan te kondigen met een vaste klant, net group. Onder de voorwaarden van deze overeenkomst zal Hansen de nieuwste release van Hansen CCB aan de telecommunicatieprovider leveren, waardoor de net group betere klantenservice, facturering en productbeheer krijgt.

articles.title: Hyfé Scales Production of Mycelium Protein Powder Ahead of Schedule
articles.excerpt: Hyfé, a climate-Tech company unlocking low-cost production of sustainable essential goods, today announced it has scaled production of its mycelium pr
articles.summary:
December 14, 2022 08:11 AM Eastern Standard Time CHICAGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Hyfé, a climate-Tech company unlocking low-cost production of sustainable essential goods, today announced it has scaled production of its mycelium protein to 400L pilot bioreactors since its launch and pre-seed funding last May.



The company is three months ahead of schedule, having completed scale up in November with the support of Boston BioWorks and the University of Illinois Integrated Bioprocessing Research Lab.

Hyfé is transforming Food manufacturing waste streams into fermentation feedstock.

articles.author: Lydia Venn
articles.excerpt: It's coming very soon
articles.summary:
Netflix Netflix has just confirmed their next documentary film will be Pamela, A Love Story. The new film will tell the story of the iconic Pamela Anderson in her own words. The film drops in January next year and promises to be an "unfiltered" and true representation of Pamela. Whilst we eagerly await the film's release, this is everything we know about Netflix's Pamela, A Love Story so far. 
What's Pamela, A Love Story about? 
Netflix's documentary movie about Pamela Anderson was first announced in March earlier this year.

articles.summary:
Científicos de California lograron reproducir la energía solar en condiciones de laboratorio, escribe el New York Times. El servicio de salud en Gran Bretaña está en una situación peor que durante la pandemia, informa The Guardian. 10 drones kamikaze fueron derribados sobre Kiev, según Ukrinform. Las fuerzas especiales británicas participaron en 'operaciones secretas' en Ucrania en abril, informa RT. Barricadas en Kosovo: lucha o abuso, dice Danas(Ilustración, la inflación se desaceleró bruscamente en noviembre, lo que alentó tanto a la Reserva Federal como a los consumidores a que el aumento rápido e implacable de los precios comenzara a moderarse significativamente, escribe el New York Times) 

Científicos de California han anunciado que finalmente han logrado reproducir la energía solar en condiciones de laboratorio.

articles.title: ETH Zurich and Swiss defence agency launch joint robotics programme
articles.excerpt: Prof. Dr. Detlef Günther (2nd from left) and Dr. Thomas Rothacher (2nd from right) sign the agreement on the 'Safety Robotics' program on December 8, 2022. (Image: Jasmin Frei / © VBS/DDPS)
articles.summary: Prof. Dr. Detlef Günther (2nd from left) and Dr. Thomas Rothacher (2nd from right) sign the agreement on the 'Safety Robotics' program on December 8, 2022. (Image: Jasmin Frei / © VBS/DDPS) ETH Zurich and armasuisse Science and Technology are launching a joint security robotics programme. Over the course of five years, armasuisse will be investing 2.5 million Swiss francs in selected research projects. ETH Zurich and armasuisse Science and Technology (S+T) – the centre of technology at the Swiss Federal Department of Defence, Civil Protection and Sport (DDPS) – are already working closely together on various projects.

articles.title: Intermittent fasting may help bring diabetes into remission
articles.author: Daniel Mediavilla
articles.excerpt: In recent years, studies have proven that weight loss can help those living with type 2 diabetes be less reliant on drugs such as insulin
articles.summary: In 1980, 4.7% of the global population suffered from type 2 diabetes, a condition associated with obesity and aging. The figure reached 8.5% in 2014 and 9.3% by 2019. In mostly low and middle-income countries, the prevalence of the disease continues to grow.Until very recently, it was thought that type 2 diabetes – which increases the risk of cardiovascular disease and cancer – initiated a degenerative process that always got worse and ended up requiring insulin and other drugs to manage it.In 2017, The Lancet medical journal published the DiRECT study.

articles.title: White House reveals winter COVID-19 plans, more free tests
articles.author: White House Correspodent
articles.excerpt: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Biden administration is again making some free COVID-19 tests available to all American households as it unveils its contingency plans for potential coronavirus surges this…
articles.summary:
WASHINGTON (AP) — The Biden administration is again making some free COVID-19 tests available to all American households as it unveils its contingency plans for potential coronavirus surges this winter.
After a three-month hiatus, the administration is making four rapid virus tests available to all U.S. households through covidtests.gov starting Thursday, a senior administration official said. The official spoke on the condition of anonymity to discuss the program. COVID-19 cases have shown a marked increase after the Thanksgiving holiday, and further increases are projected from indoor gathering and travel around Christmas and New Year's.

articles.title: White House announces new COVID-19 prevention efforts, including free tests, vaccination clinics, support for nursing homes
articles.author: Karen Weintraub
articles.excerpt: Biden administration announces new efforts to reduce COVID-19 as cases rise after Thanksgiving holiday. Will provide more tests, shots and treatments.
articles.summary:
As COVID-19 cases rise again with the arrival of winter and holiday gatherings, the White House Thursday announced its plans for controlling cases this winter.
Arizona Snowbowl in Flagstaff on opening day 2022
President Joe Biden lands at Luke Air Force Base
Senate passes bill to boost US tech industry
NFL Week 13 Overreactions
Members of the public speak at the Maricopa County Board of Supervisors meeting
Red Mountain Big 3 ready to take next step to football final
Buckeye Police and family of Anaiah Walker ask public for help solving case
AP VoteCast: Abortion's role in 2022 election
Americans will be able to order four more free COVID-19 tests per household, collaborating with communities to open pop-up or mobile vaccination sites, pre-positioning critical supplies like masks gloves and gowns from the Strategic National Stockpile and providing more support to nursing homes and long-term care facilities to protect the most vulnerable.

articles.title: Tories make billionaire ex-Mubarak minister party's senior treasurer
articles.author: Rowena Mason
articles.excerpt: Mohamed Mansour, who served under Egyptian autocrat, given role fundraising in run-up to election
articles.summary: The Conservatives have appointed an Egyptian-born billionaire and former minister under the Mubarak regime to be one of their senior fundraisers before the next election.Rishi Sunak made the announcement that Mohamed Mansour would be the senior treasurer of the Conservative party at a reception for a group of donors on Monday night.Mansour's company Unatrac has donated more than £600,000 to the party. He was also last year given a role on the government's advisory investment council as founder of his family-owned investment firm Man Capital.

articles.title: Joe Mazzulla makes Celtics figure it out, leading to win over Lakers
articles.author: Jared Weiss
articles.excerpt: Joe Mazzulla hung his team out to dry against the Lakers. It worked to perfection for an OT win to end the West Coast trip.
articles.summary: LOS ANGELES — The Celtics are exhausted by now. After 10 days on the road, the second night of a back-to-back, players start to really miss their beds.After they were a shell of themselves against the Clippers, Celtics coach Joe Mazzulla sensed his team was on the verge of letting the tide wash over them as they waited to board that plane back to Boston. It didn't matter that the Bucks crushed a Warriors team that had just torched them a few days earlier, putting the Celtics' seemingly eternal grasp on the league's best record suddenly on the line Tuesday.
articles.rights: ©2022 The Athletic Media Company. All rights reserved.

articles.title: Can't serve turkey this Christmas? Here are 10 delicious alternatives – as picked by top chefs
articles.author: Stuart Heritage
articles.excerpt: With the festive staple in short supply and more expensive than ever, this could be the year to try something new. How about slow-roasted lamb, or mullet with sage and onion?
articles.summary: Brace yourselves for the possibility of a turkey-free Christmas. An avian flu epidemic means that demand could outstrip supply this year. What's more, the cost of living crisis means that shelling out on a giant bird may not be feasible for many of us. But don't get downhearted. First, not everyone likes turkey – for some, it's too plain, too dry and too annoying to cook – and second, this is the perfect opportunity to start a new tradition. We asked a number of top chefs for their best turkey alternatives.

articles.title: Republican who wanted Trump to declare ‘Marshall' law only regrets the misspelling
articles.author: Martin Pengelly
articles.excerpt: Text from Ralph Norman to Mark Meadows, Donald Trump's final chief of staff, urged president to declare martial law
articles.summary: A Republican who urged the Trump White House to declare martial law to stop Joe Biden taking office has only one regret: that he misspelled 'martial'.Ron DeSantis leads Donald Trump by 23 points in Republican pollThe text from Ralph Norman of South Carolina to Mark Meadows, Donald Trump's final chief of staff, was given to the January 6 committee by Meadows and revealed by Talking Points Memo this week.On 17 January 2021, 11 days after the deadly Capitol attack and three days before Biden's inauguration, Norman wrote: 'Mark, in seeing what's happening so quickly, and reading about the Dominion law suits attempting to stop any meaningful investigation we are at a point of no return in saving our Republic !! Our LAST HOPE is invoking Marshall Law!! PLEASE URGE TO PRESIDENT TO DO SO!!'No response from Meadows was revealed.

articles.title: Dominic Raab facing five more complaints of bullying, No 10 confirms
articles.author: Pippa Crerar
articles.excerpt: Formal complaints from civil servants mean deputy PM is under investigation for eight separate alleged incidents
articles.summary: Dominic Raab is facing five more formal complaints from Ministry of Justice civil servants over allegations of bullying behaviour during his previous stint running the department, No 10 has confirmed.Downing Street announced that the justice secretary was now under investigation for a total of eight separate incidents with No 10 officials saying they want the independent inquiry concluded swiftly.The deputy prime minister had vowed to 'thoroughly rebut and refute' the three official complaints he was already facing, one from the MoJ and two others from his time as foreign secretary and Brexit secretary.
